WorkItem.Description: Using the File->Save to Repository option automatically fills in the box with the last used profile, but replaces the periods ('.') with spaces (when using the recommended profile naming format [Region].[Realm].[Character].[Profile]).  The user then needs to manually replace the spaces with periods before loading.  The Load From Repository option correctly leaves the last entered periods intact.
WorkItem.Summary: Save to Repository removes periods (minor issue)
